short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extract soft-coded subtitles from local video files as SRT files, no upload required.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extract and edit softcoded subtitles from video files directly in your browser! Subtitle Extractor is your go-to Chrome extension for seamlessly working with softcoded subtitles without uploading your videos to external servers.

Key Features:
üöÄ Lightning-fast softcoded subtitle extraction right in your browser
üîí Local processing - your videos never leave your device
‚úèÔ∏è Built-in subtitle editor for viewing and modifying extracted subtitles
üíæ Save subtitle files in SRT, VTT, or plain text formats
üéµ Extract audio directly from your video files

How It Works:

1) Install the extension
2) Click the Subtitle Extractor Extension icon
3) Drag and drop your video file into the extension window
4) View and edit the extracted subtitles in the built-in editor
5) Download your subtitle file in SRT, VTT, or text format

Why Choose Subtitle Extractor Extension?

- Privacy: All processing happens locally - your videos stay on your device
- Speed: Extract softcoded subtitles in seconds
- Flexibility: Edit subtitles before downloading
- Simplicity: No complex settings or technical knowledge required
- Convenience: Work with subtitles directly in your browser

Important Notes:

This extension works only with softcoded subtitles (text files embedded within the video container). For hardcoded subtitles (permanently overlaid on the video image) or audio transcription, please visit our website: subtitleextractor.com
